definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: To solve the problem, the welding joint construction was re-designed and argon-arc welding was employed.
sentences.chinese: 解決措施爲採用氬弧焊，改進焊接結構設計等。

sentences.english: Welding seam performed in prefabrication shop denote with "S ".
sentences.chinese: 在預製廠焊接的焊縫，用“S”表示。

sentences.english: License for Dangerous Chemical Warehouse Keeper, Electrician and Welder, etc.
sentences.chinese: 危險化學品倉庫管理員證，電工證及焊接工等。

sentences.english: I then soldered up the top and bottom of the boiler.
sentences.chinese: 當時我焊接起來的頂部和底部鍋爐。

sentences.english: Moreover, the welding quality of the chip can be discriminated.
sentences.chinese: 並可鑑別管芯焊接質量。

sentences.english: The welding repair technology and method of copper tile cracks were presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了銅瓦裂紋的焊接返修工藝及其措施。
焊接連接閥座採用鎢鉻鈷合金6閥座面。

sentences.english: No welding ground shall be made on the coated part of the article.
sentences.chinese: 管道塗塑的地方不允許用作焊接接地。

sentences.english: On site experiment at oil field proves that the heat barrier pipe made by welding method has rather good quality.
sentences.chinese: 焊接的隔熱管經油田現場試驗，結果表明其性能良好。

sentences.english: This machine is ideal f grinding various types of turning tool.
sentences.chinese: 該機能用於磨削各種規格的焊接式刀具。

sentences.english: The system eliminated all the soldering to the internal sub-assembly.
sentences.chinese: 該系統去除了連接到內部配件的所有焊接。

sentences.english: It adopts Aluminum pipe precise forming technology to guarantee ultrasonic welding steady and reliable.
sentences.chinese: 採用鋁管精密成型技術，保障超聲波焊接穩定可靠。

sentences.english: All welds shall be undetectable in finished work.
sentences.chinese: 完成設備的所有焊接應無法探察。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a new type of control circuit of SAW.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種新型的埋弧自動焊接機的控制電路。

sentences.english: These values mentioned above are also to be used for butt-joint welds.
sentences.chinese: 這些價值以上提到並且將被使用爲接界聯接焊接。

definition: to stamp/to press (sheet metal)/Taiwan pr. [chong1 ya1]
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
